level.text: Each applicant shall provide documentation of income that shall include the following:
For a gross income determination, each applicant shall provide evidence of any of the following documentation that is applicable:
Any other public assistance documentation; or
Any other award letter for receipt of cash benefits.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Emergency Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 5605 (May 28, 2004) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 7435 (July 30, 2004).
